item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Marvin. J. Ashton
item.description: "Do not allow yourselves to be made to feel inadequate or frustrated because you cannot do everything others seem to be accomplishing. Only you and your Father in Heaven know your needs, strengths, and desires. Around this knowledge your personal course must be charted and your chioces made." -- Marvin. J. Ashton

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Basically, I have two speeds.... Hostile or smart-aleck. Your choice." -- James Patterson

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
item.description: "We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience." -- Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Barbara Bush
item.description: "At the end of your life, you will never regret winning one more verdict or earning one more paycheck. You WILL regret time not spent with a spouse, a friend or a loved one." -- Barbara Bush

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Harold B. Lee
item.description: "Be loyal to the royal that is in you, for you are the child of a King." -- Harold B. Lee

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description:
"God expects you to have enough faith and determination and enough trust in Him to keep moving, keep living, keep rejoicing. In fact, He expects you not simply to face the future (that sounds pretty grim and stoic); He expects you to embrace and shape the future--to love it and rejoice in it and delight in your opportunities.
God is anxiously waiting for the chance to answer your prayers and fulfill your dreams, just as He always has. But He can't if you don't pray, and He can't if you don't dream. In short, He can't if you don't believe." -- Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Lewis Hine
item.description: "If I could tell the story in words, I wouldn't need to lug around a camera. " -- Lewis Hine

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Sarah Ban Breathnach
item.description: "Celebrate the Sacred in the ordinary." -- Sarah Ban Breathnach

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Wayne Dyer
item.description: "With everything that has happened to you, you can either feel sorry for yourself or treat what has happened as a gift. Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose." -- Dr. Wayne Dyer

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Neal A. Maxwell
item.description: "We cannot improve the world if we are conformed to the world." -- Neal A. Maxwell

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Neal A. Maxwell
item.description: "Faith in God includes Faith in God's timing." -- Neal A. Maxwell

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "that's as nutty as squirrel turds" -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Life is short, Break the Rules. Forgive quickly, Kiss SLOWLY. Love truly. Laugh uncontrollably And never regret ANYTHING That makes you smile." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Rose Franken
item.description: "Anyone can be passionate but it takes real lovers to be silly." -- Rose Franken

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Out of clutter, find simplicity. From discord, find harmony. In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity." -- Albert Einstein
